name: nanoclaw
description: Personal Claude assistant. Lightweight, secure, customizable.

scripts.build: tsc && cd agent-runner && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.webui:dev: trap 'kill 0' INT TERM; tsx src/index.ts --api --no-whatsapp & cd webui && PORT=4319 BACKEND_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4317 NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=ws://127.0.0.1:4317/api/ws npm run dev
scripts.webui:dev:wa: trap 'kill 0' INT TERM; tsx src/index.ts --api & cd webui && PORT=4319 BACKEND_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4317 NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=ws://127.0.0.1:4317/api/ws npm run dev
scripts.webui:frontend: cd webui && PORT=4319 BACKEND_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4317 NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=ws://127.0.0.1:4317/api/ws npm run dev
